AltStore source with tweaked apps and possibly more.

apps.name: uYouPlus
apps.subtitle: The best tweak for the YouTube app just got even better
apps.localizedDescription:
uYou is the best tweak for the YouTube app.

uYouPlus is a modified version of uYou with even more features.

Additional features:
â€¢ Skip sponsorships in videos (iSponsorBlock)
â€¢ Even more PiP options (YouPiP)
â€¢ Unlock 1440p and 2160p resolutions (YTUHD)
â€¢ Automatically play videos in full screen (YTAutoFullScreen)
â€¢ Revert to the original video quality selector (YTClassicVideoQuality)
â€¢ Disable overlay at the end of videos (YTNoHoverCards)
â€¢ Remove Local Network permission check (YTNoCheckLocalNetwork)
â€¢ Make YouTube remember video caption setting, if not already (YouRememberCaption)
â€¢ Remove YouTube Premium upsell alerts (NoYTPremium)
â€¢ Even more playback speeds (YTSpeed)
â€¢ Enable the miniplayer for all videos (YTMiniplayerEnabler)
â€¢ Prevent the notch/Dynamic Island from cutting into 2:1 videos (DontEatMyContent)
â€¢ Enable YouTube shorts progress/scrubber (YTShortsProgress)
â€¢ Configure A/B settings in the YouTube app (YTABConfig)
â€¢ And possibly more

More information: 
https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/ 

Requires iOS 14.0 or later.
